pli-tv-bu-vb-sk48:2.1: The monks’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk48:5.1: 48. The training rule on scattering rice
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk48:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk48:6.2: At that time the monks from the group of six ate scattering rice about. …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk48:7.2: “‘I will not eat scattering rice about,’ this is how you should train.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk48:8.1: One should not eat scattering rice about.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk48:8.2: If a monk out of disrespect eats scattering rice about, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk48:9.9: if he is the first offender.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk48:10.1: The eighth training rule is finished.
